name: tm51
effect: Teaches Roost to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Ally Switch to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Roost)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
